title: 06/22/2021 - HOUR 1 - Kevin Durant, NBA, Clippers-Suns

description:
It's hard for Kevin Durant to be the face of the league

Tom Brady wasn't bashing who you think

Thoughts on the NBA Western Conference Finals

Carl Nassib is a wonderful story


Guest: Ric Bucher
